items.sentence: I think I\'ve convinced Tom not to do that anymore.
I think Tom isn\'t going to be busy this afternoon.
Tom said that I could spend the night at his place.
Tom stopped talking when Mary walked into the room.
Did Tom tell Mary who would be coming to the party?
Did the doctor give you any medicine for your cold?
Did you ask Tom if he wished to do that by himself?
Did you break the window on purpose or by accident?
Did you find anything in that store that you liked?
Did you get a Christmas present from Tom this year?
It was too muggy for me to get to sleep last night.
It was yesterday morning that I saw Tom on the bus.
It would take forever for me to explain everything.
My father used to say that money is not everything.
One person here has already died from this disease.
Our next meeting will be held next on October 20th.
Our teacher reminded us not to forget our homework.
Out of twenty students, only one has read the book.
Tom had no choice but to give Mary what she wanted.
Tom has enough money to do whatever he wants to do.
I could have gone to college, but I decided not to.
How long did you think the party was going to last?
How long do you think the concert is going to last?
How long does it take to the train station by taxi?
A meal without wine is like a day without sunshine.
Didn\'t you know that Tom wasn\'t going to do that?
Tom hasn\'t gone anywhere. He\'s still in his room.
I doubt very seriously that Tom would ever do that.
Have they found out what happened to that airplane?
Have you considered trying to find a job in Boston?
Have you ever been in a long distance relationship?
Tom and Mary both started talking at the same time.
Tom and Mary both wanted to go to Boston with John.
Tom and Mary decided to go to marriage counselling.
Tom and Mary discussed their future plans together.
I wonder if Tom still remembers where we first met.
I wonder what Tom will be doing tomorrow afternoon.
I wonder what it would be like to be a millionaire.
I wonder whether Tom wants to do that today or not.
I wonder whether or not Tom will ask me to do that.
I wonder whether or not Tom will insist we do that.
Let\'s talk about what we\'re going to do about it.
Tom is in charge of this year\'s tennis tournament.
Tom is just jealous that we\'re having so much fun.
Both my father and my brother are fond of gambling.
Bus fares vary according to the length of the trip.
Can you explain to me how I can get to the airport?
I used to worry about everything, but now I don\'t.
I usually don\'t eat just one banana for breakfast.
I want the whole world to know that we\'re in love.
